name: idea-to-product
description: SaaS validation, go-to-market strategy, and product development framework. Takes ideas from concept to launch. Use when: validating startup ideas, planning product launches, creating MVPs.
chainOfThought: 1. Validate problem exists. 2. Identify target customer. 3. Define MVP scope. 4. Plan go-to-market. 5. Set success metrics. 6. Create launch timeline.
